data.text:
.@FedericaMog ahead of ministerial meetings EU/E3 and EU/E3 + Iran: 

"We will discuss strong commitment to preserve #IranDeal and steps to preserve the agreement"

#JCPOA https://t.co/xcDHCrcFOz

VP @jyrkikatainen on EU-US Trade relations:

"We are open for improving trade relations with the US but we do not negotiate under any kind of threat. Before entering into negotiations, if ever happens, we need to get support from EU Member States."
#EUTrade https://t.co/7vIXRs1ND7

👏 Congratulations to the 29 #EuropeanHeritageAwards winners for their inspiring contributions to safeguarding and revitalising our cultural heritage enabling us discover, explore and engage with our roots and build the #FutureofEurope → https://t.co/XcUtFZ6hBg #EuropeForCulture https://t.co/v3hNkhng9P

Ten days ahead of the entry into application of the General Data Protection Regulation #GDPR, we present actions European leaders can take to protect citizens' privacy and make the EU #DigitalSingleMarket a reality before the end of 2018 →
https://t.co/VtXih7euYA
#FutureofEurope https://t.co/d1Ud2UvGy3

data.text:
In industry, EU-funded research contributed to 
🔘 Developing a super battery
🏠 Using 3D printing to build new houses
♻️ Turning non-food crop into cosmetics and bioplastics 
#HorizonEU #SingleMarket https://t.co/kwYPNf7UMk

In transport, EU-funded research contributed to 
✈️ Producing ‘solar’ jet fuel from water and carbon dioxide
🚢 Designing future 100% electric ferries
🚌 Developing hydrogen fuel cell powered buses
#HorizonEU #MobilityEU https://t.co/QaShoe4tSz

We support research in areas delivering incredible results.
In healthcare, EU-funded research contributed to
🏥 Improving cancer treatment and chemotherapy
💉 Developing 1.6 million Ebola vaccine doses  
🔬 Creating a revolutionary device detecting bacteria
#HorizonEU https://t.co/AurLvptGPK

With only 7% of the world’s population, Europe accounts for 20% of global R&D investment and holds a leading position in several industrial sectors.
We need to act fast to lead the new wave of innovation and set the standard for global competition. #FutureofEurope #HorizonEU https://t.co/uMxxBcfs3w

Investing in research and innovation is investing in the #FutureofEurope. 
To take our ambition to the next level, we need innovation-friendly regulation and financing, in particular venture capital: https://t.co/8Hu4Hptzri #VentureEU #HorizonEU https://t.co/VNBoaptGkq

Europe has world-class research and strong #DataProtection rules. 
But we must do better – much better – at turning that excellence into success. @jyrkikatainen and @Moedas ahead of Leaders’ meeting in Sofia #HorizonEU #FutureofEurope https://t.co/HRKp8rtiG0

Today, municipalities will be able to apply for €15,000 EU financing to install free wireless internet hotspots in their public space. 
First-come first-served! 
Apply from 13:00 CET → https://t.co/N1K4cszVpr #WiFi4EU https://t.co/BtOa9OBlD1

#IranDeal: 

As long as Iran continues to implement its nuclear related commitments, EU will remain committed.

It is the culmination of 12 years of diplomacy which has been delivering on its main goal. 

#JCPOA , key element of the global nuclear non-proliferation architecture. https://t.co/oHxDZ0p7NA

On 15 May the first call for municipality applications for free Wi-Fi hotspots opens at 13:00 CEST.
Some 1,183 municipalities will receive a #WiFi4EU voucher of €15,000 to finance Wi-Fi equipment and its installation in public spaces → https://t.co/Yvcjiqw86X https://t.co/vBAzxsq6Wd

Making our buildings smarter is key to lower energy bills, improve citizens' health and protect the environment.
This morning, the 1st of 8 legal proposals in the #CleanEnergyEU package has been adopted @EUCouncil → https://t.co/XW01Vcr55W #EPBD https://t.co/NIWRT7PNZb
📌 Take a look at the #TeamJunckerEU calendar for the week → https://t.co/ZigxLU0UHq https://t.co/xughDJW1DC

Nature is full of surprises.
Watch Oona by Finnish director Zaida Bergroth 🎥 🎬 https://t.co/ONfdFUCgma #EUandMe 🇪🇺 🇫🇮 https://t.co/fdaDe1pD9m

Recent scandals like Dieselgate, Luxleaks, Panama Papers and Cambridge Analytica show that whistleblowers can play an important role in uncovering unlawful activities damaging the public interest. #whistleblower https://t.co/vOMv8I0NOx

The protection of our environment when launching new projects is important to us.
Would you like to be more involved and better informed on the environmental implications of public plans?
Then this consultation is for you → https://t.co/AYEYD2dIdr #EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/w69aO64RCG

How much power do you have? You have the power to shape EU policies! The European Citizens’ Initiative allows Europeans to get together and propose concrete legal changes on a common cause.  https://t.co/T3GGefLZtW #EUTakeTheInitiative https://t.co/DZbzMysa66

Oona is lost. How will she get back home? Find out!
Watch Oona by Finnish director Zaida Bergroth 🎥 🎬 https://t.co/ONfdFUCgma #EUandMe 🇪🇺 🇫🇮 https://t.co/UnHvLveck7

After getting lost in a dense forest, a young girl must rely on the assistance of an unlikely companion to find her way home; watch Oona here 🎥 🎬 https://t.co/ONfdFUTRKK #EUandMe 🇪🇺 🇫🇮 https://t.co/LQ7l9eN4Zk

data.text: An elderly woman dreams of travelling across #Europe with her grandchildren but her plan has unexpected results: watch #TheLivingHostel by @MatthiasHoene now 🎥 🎬 https://t.co/ONfdFUCgma #EUandMe 🇩🇪 🇪🇺 https://t.co/19nMECgTTm

As an EU citizen you are free to travel, live, study and work across borders: watch The Living Hostel, a film by @MatthiasHoene 🎥 🎬 #EUandMe 🇩🇪 🇪🇺 https://t.co/ONfdFUCgma #EuropeDay https://t.co/T9MsuuqVYy

It is time to decide what the European Union at 27 should be. 
Whatever happens, it must be a Europe built by Europeans.
On #EuropeDay, we are launching an online public consultation on the #FutureofEurope addressed to all Europeans → https://t.co/5TAsxw3F8D https://t.co/tVcH0us1oq

@Poulin2012 @ConsultationsFR @EU_EESC @UEfrance @touteleurope @NathalieLoiseau Bonjour, @KantarPublic a défini aléatoirement une combinaison de 100 profils individuels, sur base de données statistiques nationales consolidées au niveau de l'UE27 pour constituer un groupe reflétant la diversité au sein des 27 (critères socio-démographiques). @NatashaBertaud

@montagne_thomas Bonjour @montagne_thomas, 
Je vous invite à aller voir ce que font toutes les représentations de la Commission dans l'UE. Quelques bonnes surprises vous y attendent!
https://t.co/OPJmqDnIRI
Bonne #Fetedeleurope
To make a long story short, we’ve compiled Europe's greatest achievements for you in the form of emojis! #EuropeDay https://t.co/XkW7CUgs7I

Of course we keep track of all these historic moments.
The archives service, created in 1983, takes care of these gems and makes them available for further use. #EuropeDay https://t.co/5Xpk4kyuh2

16 years ago, in 2002, we celebrated the arrival of the euro in grand style with the motto “the €uro: the European Union in your hand”. 
No special effects, but some impressive acrobatic skills. #EuropeDay https://t.co/bNqz7g2LO3

25 years ago, in 1993, we established the #SingleMarket, with the "four freedoms" at its heart: free movement of goods, capital, services and labour.
We proclaimed it with this video… and the typical look and feel of the ‘90s. #EuropeDay https://t.co/X0J9sgo1aW

31 years ago, in 1987, we launched a student exchange programme: #Erasmus
All those years of mobility and cooperation have given Europe an open-minded and entrepreneurial generation of 9 million people. #EuropeDay https://t.co/h5HEYCxkqD
50 years ago, in 1968, we announced the creation of the #CustomsUnion with the aid of a well sharpened pencil and state-of-the-art technology. #EuropeDay https://t.co/PiajfekQs9

Today is #EuropeDay!
It marks the anniversary of the 1950 Schuman Declaration, paving the way for even greater achievements in the decades that followed. Check out how we communicated about EU milestones through the years… https://t.co/IhWebV4sEY

data.text:
The EU regrets today's statement by President of United States on #IranDeal. It is not a bilateral agreement & not in the hands of any single country to terminate it unilaterally. EU determined to preserve it.

@FedericaMog statement: https://t.co/VbdvRNQ8wk #JCPOA https://t.co/x0RCxvjAg7

data.text:
📽 #Cannes2018 déroule son tapis rouge pour les films européens!
Pas moins de dix-huit films sélectionnés sont cofinancés par #MEDIAprogEU dont quatre en compétition pour remporter la Palme d'Or !
Bonne projection… https://t.co/AlQHAKnSgu

EU countries are also on track to reach the target of having 90% of children aged between 3 and the mandatory school age in childcare.
These targets are a crucial part of our strategy to ensure women can fully participate in the labour market. #SocialRights https://t.co/LgWd5ooTAo

1 in 3 children in the EU now has access to high quality and affordable  childcare, according to latest report.
Access to affordable childcare is one of the principles of the European Pillar of #SocialRights.
https://t.co/rOP8LchPKI https://t.co/ZNs555tCqk

There will be no #FutureofEurope without you.
96 Europeans from all around Europe prepared 12 simple questions to be asked to all EU citizens. Stay tuned, we will unveil them on #EuropeDay. https://t.co/IEsduSP4Q9

@garethharding @jasonlknoll @adrechsel @ktowens @jonworth @Usherwood @heidi_maurer @Karolka55 @anandMenon1 @EUintheUS ... or for more visual elements (infographics, charts and maps) at our repository of factsheets https://t.co/9KzOwZH4ff

@garethharding @jasonlknoll @adrechsel @ktowens @jonworth @Usherwood @heidi_maurer @Karolka55 @anandMenon1 @EUintheUS ... or at this series of short papers "EU at a glance" with focus on specific policy areas https://t.co/Zwb2VZO12q

We offer our deepest condolences after the passing of journalist Andy Carling. Our thoughts go to his family and friends. His kindness of heart and sharpness of wit will live long in our memories. https://t.co/fNhJ8YaKmq

🏆 You broke a record! 
You were 15,000 visitors walking through our Berlaymont building on Saturday – this is 3,000 more than last year. Overall 30,000 citizens visited the EU institutions this week-end.
Thank you for the visit and see you at the next #EUopenDay! https://t.co/j5EPrsALsY

We support innovative projects led by female entrepreneurs! 
As part of the #JunckerPlan, we are making €250 million credit line available to increase the financing available for innovation-driven businesses in Spain → https://t.co/yi2qxmpNws #investEU https://t.co/ZHuhHhrHzu

data.text:
.@Snapchat joins our EU Code of Conduct to fight illegal hate speech online, the seventh major IT platform to commit.
This will help protect the younger generations using Snapchat. 
https://t.co/A8RgQ0aeK9 #NoPlace4Hate https://t.co/yByHQvodh7

We have approved the acquisition of Ilva by ArcelorMittal. 
The decision is conditional on the divestiture of an extensive remedy package to preserve effective competition on European steel markets to the benefit of consumers and businesses → https://t.co/luk4r8m9F1
📌 Check out the #TeamJunckerEU calendar with #EUdialogues this week and #EuropeDay on 9 May → https://t.co/ZigxLU0UHq https://t.co/uIjjAr56N7

@INVICTUS69X @TimoPesonen1 @sixtinebouygues @EU_EESC hi! no, the questionnaire will be put online on 9 May (https://t.co/UUbKTTU5qC). Hope you will share your views! The results will go to national governments at their December summit (#EUCO). PS the 100 citizens represented Europe's diversity (age, gender, socio-economic criteria)

@Dulcibella52 @TimoPesonen1 @sixtinebouygues @EU_EESC Hi! The Commission has no say on referendums, they are for national governments to call. For your information: the results of the #CitizensConsultations will be made available to national governments in the framework of December European Summit (#EUCO). KR, the Social Media Team

After an intensive working week-end, the Citizens' panel approves the questionnaire on the #FutureofEurope! It will be made available online in all 🇪🇺's official languages this 9 May, #EuropeDay! 

Bookmark https://t.co/UUbKTTU5qC to take part in the #CitizensConsultations! https://t.co/cwshRZacbJ

@linuxLearnr @TimoPesonen1 @sixtinebouygues @EU_EESC hi! no, actually participants were selected by our partner @KantarPublic  based on statistical data and in order to reflect the diversity of  European citizens (age, gender, socio-economic indicators,...). Kind  regards, the Social Media Team

From affordable housing in Poland to cancer research in Austria to food production in Greece, #JunckerPlan is boosting jobs and growth throughout Europe. We now have an investment target of at least 500 billion euros by 2020 #investEU https://t.co/sSF3ptEF9m

data.text:
Did you know that the whole Universe may be finite? 
This is what the last paper of Stephen Hawking is teaching us. It was co-authored with Thomas Hertog, @ERC_Research grantee. #EUaddedValue Learn more → https://t.co/Eib5QRyBOZ #HorizonEU https://t.co/SdDXhCgelq

European Citizens' Initiative
9 million citizens from all 28 EU countries have become involved in EU law-making since this tool started in 2012.
Our new approach has led to more initiatives being accepted for registration→ https://t.co/WM5l4oaStw  #EUTakeTheInitiative #ECI https://t.co/5Jph7UKJCH
@AKeizerHGZ @TimoPesonen1 @sixtinebouygues @EU_EESC Hi! The Citizens’ panel, reflecting the diversity of European opinions is indeed preparing a large online consultation. On 9 May, we go digital!

European Citizen's panel for the #FutureOfEurope.  

Almost 100 Europeans, from 27 countries, in Brussels with us to decide on the topics that will be at the heart of the #CitizensConsultations. https://t.co/TQr28PxAUm

@ThPeine @EU_EESC Hi! Participants were selected by our partner @KantarPublic based on statistical data and in order to reflect the diversity of European citizens (age, gender, socio-economic indicators,...). Kind regards, the Social Media Team

In Brussels today? 
Come visit us! 
Enjoy an interactive walk through our Berlaymont building with 27 stands and fun activities explaining the main EU policies. 🇪🇺
Learn more: https://t.co/RIYzmjmpBo  #EUopenDay #EuropeForCulture #EUandME https://t.co/2TaTEDMcyy
The European Union 🇪🇺 is based on democracy, rule of law and human rights. #ThisIsTheEU #EuropeDay https://t.co/xkMmOgHxGp

Check out our proposal for a modern, simple and flexible #EUBudget for the 2021-2027 period. By focusing on the areas where the Union is best placed to deliver, we are building a Europe that protects, empowers and defends → https://t.co/HoIyJEpmxN  #FutureOfEurope https://t.co/ksRDivsD2o

In Brussels tomorrow? 
Come visit us at the #EUopenDay!
Enjoy an interactive walk through our Berlaymont building with 27 stands and activities explaining the main EU policies.
Learn more → https://t.co/RIYzmjmpBo  #EuropeForCulture #EUandME https://t.co/s09NEEzlW7

For the first time, we are convening a Citizens' Panel to draft a public consultation on the #FutureofEurope.
On 5-6 May a group of 80 Europeans will meet in Brussels to work together on the consultation to be launched on 9 May, #EuropeDay. 
#CitizensConsultations https://t.co/79VZ00SIFF

The first 15,000 18-year-olds will get the opportunity to travel Europe this summer!
This new EU initiative gives young people the opportunity to discover their continent.
Applications open in June → https://t.co/9kZotLyI3o #DiscoverEU #EuropeforCulture https://t.co/UTyYDK9yN3

Congratulations to the 50 winners of the @ERC_Research innovation grant competition! Grants worth up to €150,000 will bring research findings to the market. 
More on the projects: https://t.co/ZN96WvfXYd #investEU https://t.co/X2oBkaIT8A

Find here the level of penalties car manufacturers face if they break the law, consumer compensation, how the independence of quality of testing will be reinforced, who will pay for the testing and much more https://t.co/Mx1zYzqwDI https://t.co/OY6VbsGj3Q
Testing of emissions from cars- How does it work? What about CO2 emissions testing? What is the Commission doing? All the information here: https://t.co/OGVWhGwC4w

Clean air- we are improving car emissions tests further to better protect our health and environment, restore confidence and add yet another incentive for a quick shift to zero emissions vehicles. 
https://t.co/BWJLJFEg0a https://t.co/JQYYDxizR1

Does the current SME definition ensure policies are consistent for smaller businesses across the EU?
Let us know by responding to our online questionnaire by 6 May, available in 23 EU languages → https://t.co/OelpobyOMy #EUHaveYourSay https://t.co/Ga0b0PyNHt

A budget matching our ambitions

🗨️  Commissioner @GOettingerEU answers your questions about the #EUBudget beyond 2020. Use the hashtag #EUBudget to comment and raise your questions https://t.co/RqSIvRttx5

🗨️ Join us on at 13.00 CET today for a live chat with Commissioner @GOettingerEU. He will reply to your questions about the #EUbudget beyond 2020. Use the hashtag #EUBudget to ask your questions! https://t.co/7UaG7e2iq1

Strong growth is expected to continue in 2018 and 2019, since our economies are expanding at their fastest pace in a decade.
Jobs, growth and investment remain our top priority. #ECForecast https://t.co/2z8oSNu9tf
